about_the_game:
The Castle of Xanxillia is an immersive exploration-focused side-scroller action RPG that brings together all the beloved features of the Metroidvania genre in one content-packed experience. You play as Leonel, a determined man on a quest to find his brother, Lenoel, within the mysterious and treacherous Castle of Xanxillia.

The castle, ruled by a sinister Dark Lord with the help of a corrupt Bishop, has become a den of evil. To uncover the truth and rescue his brother, Leonel must navigate through dangerous areas and battle formidable enemies. Confront the darkness and save Lenoel from the clutches of evil in this thrilling adventure.

What's in the Game?

Exploration and Backtracking
Immerse yourself in a vast, interconnected world that begs to be explored. Our game features a meticulously crafted map reminiscent of Castlevania: Symphony of the Night, where every nook and cranny hides secrets waiting to be uncovered. With new abilities and items, backtracking becomes an essential and rewarding part of your journey, opening up previously inaccessible areas and hidden treasures.

Challenging Combat
Prepare for intense and satisfying combat that will test your skills and strategy. Engage in battles against a diverse array of enemies and formidable bosses, each requiring a unique approach. Master a variety of weapons and spells, each with its own upgrade and leveling system, to find the perfect combination that suits your playstyle.

Character Progression
Our game offers a robust character progression system that lets you grow stronger and more capable as you play. Upgrade and level up your weapons and spells to enhance their power and effectiveness. Discover or craft new equipment that will give you the edge in combat and exploration. Your character’s growth is not just in strength, but in versatility, allowing you to tackle challenges in multiple ways.

Atmospheric Graphics and Sound
Experience stunning 2.5D graphics where lovingly crafted 3D models come to life in a richly detailed 2D environment. Our visuals are designed to captivate and immerse you, utilizing techniques that push the boundaries of traditional 2D games. Complementing the visual feast is a hauntingly beautiful soundtrack that perfectly matches the game’s dark and mysterious atmosphere.

Story and Lore
Dive into an intriguing story filled with memorable characters and rich lore. As you progress through the game, you’ll unravel a narrative that’s as engaging as the gameplay itself. Every character, location, and item has a story to tell, adding depth and context to your adventure.

Secrets and Collectibles
Our world is packed with hidden secrets and collectible items that reward thorough exploration. Every corner of the map holds something valuable. These secrets not only provide additional challenges but also enhance the replay value of the game.

Smooth Controls and Performance
Enjoy a seamless gaming experience with responsive controls and smooth performance. Our game is designed to offer precise platforming and combat, ensuring that every input feels natural and intuitive. Whether you’re in the heat of battle or exploring intricate environments, you can rely on fluid gameplay.

Community Engagement
We value our community and strive to engage with our players through regular updates and feedback. Your input is crucial in shaping the game, and we’re committed to building a dedicated player base.

Our game is designed to deliver an experience that meets and exceeds the expectations of fans of the genre. With a combination of exploration, challenging combat, rich lore, and stunning visuals, we aim to create a world that you’ll want to return to again and again.

  • Storage: 4 GB available space
